name: Buffy Chadwick
bio: Heiress to the Chadwick Iron Smelting fortune, My Manhattan penthouse is often considered an unofficial wing of the Guggenheim.

selling.accept: Well, all right. I guess I can buy another poodle.
selling.enthusiasm: Oh, you've made me so happy. So very happy!

buying.insulted: Do you think I'm dumb just because I'm blonde?
buying.reject: It's lovely, but it clashes with my curtains
buying.accept: There is a bare corner in the butler's pantry where it might fit.
buying.enthusiasm: Oh, I just adore it! I'll put it on the ceiling above my bed!

name: Popsy
bio: Hello! I'm Lord Worthinghamshire VII, but my friends call me Popsy. My ancestor Lord Worthinghamshire I was able to obtain art for free by looting it from the colonies. Now, people insist we 'pay' instead. Rubbish!

selling.insulted: Come now, old boy, there's no need to be rude
selling.enthusiasm: Surely you're taking the piss, eh? What? You're serious?

buying.insulted: Do you take me for some simple-minded colonial?
buying.reject: Just not up to snuff, I'm afraid. High standards around here and all.
buying.accept: I suppose there is a spot in the East Wing it might fit.
buying.enthusiasm: Jolly good show! This will make a cracking addition to the collection!

name: Yuri Smirnoff
bio: I 'made' a lot of money in fall of USSR. Need to get it out of Russia without my friend Vladimir getting suspicious.

selling.insulted: You make me another offer like that I will break your legs.
selling.enthusiasm: Very generous! I include free bottle of vodka.

buying.insulted: A man in Kiev made me offer like that once. He is now goo.
buying.enthusiasm: This work, it reminds me of my dear babushka. I will remember it always.

name: Gavin Belson
bio: Every piece I contribute to my private museum is another tax deduction! Of course it's open to the public. Drop by any time between 3:17 and 3:23pm on any third Tuesday of the month during a full moon.

buying.insulted: I'm looking for Amazon here, not Pets.com. Get out of my face.
buying.reject: I'll think about it. Check back in a couple months.
buying.accept: What the hell. You miss 100% of the shots you don't take, right?
buying.enthusiasm: I gotta get in on this.

name: The Prince
bio: My grandfather rode a camel. My father drives a Mercedes. I also drive a Mercedes. Sometimes two. I stand with one foot on each and wear them like roller skates. Oh, also I buy art.

selling.insulted: May the fleas of a thousand camels infest your crotch.
selling.reject: You know we like to haggle, right?
selling.accept: Fine! I'll allow it! You can rob me this one time!
selling.enthusiasm: A thousand blessings on your house.

buying.insulted: Are you kidding me? I would not display this in YOUR house!
buying.reject: A lovely work, but perhaps if you lower the price...
buying.accept: I suppose I can find a place for it.
buying.enthusiasm: Praise Allah! This work is glorious!

name: Bleve Blartin
bio: I love art more than most collectors, because I too am an artist. Have you seen my directorial debut, 'Fartin in Memphis'? A triumph!

selling.insulted: Come on now, I get more than that for cutting the ribbon a Walgreens.
selling.reject: Let me think about it and get back to you.
selling.accept: All right. I was getting bored of that piece anyway.
selling.enthusiasm: Hachi Machi, with that I can finally make my dream film: 'Fartin in Tallahassee!'

buying.insulted: Oh, god no. Do you think I live in the Valley or something?
buying.reject: Don't get me wrong, it's good. But it just doesn't POP, you know? I want something that POPs
buying.accept: Oh, Bruce Willis has one? Well, in that case...

name: JP Wong
bio: The rolling 10-year average ROI on a carefully curated art portfolio can outperform stocks, bonds, and most commodities. It is an underrated investment strategy.

selling.insulted: In finance that would be what we call 'getting screwed'.
selling.reject: Ehh, the juice ain't worth the squeeze.
selling.enthusiasm: Looks like bonus season came early this year.

buying.insulted: Come on now. I know a dog when I see a dog.
buying.reject: That's not going to move me to the front office
buying.enthusiasm: Holey Moley, that'll make me look good come bonus season.
